suggest.ext-filter: Required to use the Postgres database driver.
suggest.fakerphp/faker: Required to use the eloquent factory builder (^1.21).
suggest.illuminate/console: Required to use the database commands (^11.0).
suggest.illuminate/events: Required to use the observers with Eloquent (^11.0).
suggest.illuminate/pagination: Required to paginate the result set (^11.0).
suggest.laravel/serializable-closure: Required to handle circular references in model serialization (^1.3).
suggest.symfony/finder: Required to use Eloquent model factories (^7.0).
